text: John Barr (born 1885) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:Sportspeople from Lanark Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Motherwell F.C. players Category:Lanemark F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: John Barr (footballer, born 1885)
